title: Ninety Six National Historic Site: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education         Colonial child during park event. Ninety Six National Historic Site  A Ninety Six Educational Experience  Whether planning a field trip to Ninety Six National Historic Site or learning about the park in the classroom, our educational pages will help you to create a memorable experience for your students.  Find useful resources for planning a field trip. Download lesson plans for use in the classroom or field trip. Prepare your students to be respectful stewards while visiting the park.  Eastern National operates the bookstore. Teachers showing a valid Teacher ID may receive a 15% discount. A traveling trunk is now available! Visit the "Curriculum Materials" page to download the "Lives of Backcountry Children" Traveling Trunk materials.
